chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: In today's video, we will learn how audio, video and media elements are used in HTML.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: We saw in our very first video that we can embed videos in HTML.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Today I will tell you how the video is auto-played,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: how to keep a muted video,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: and how you can enable and disable the video controls.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Along with that, we will also see very closely about audio,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: how media can be shown in an overall page.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So do like this video and stay in this video

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: because the examples I have used for video tags are very amazing.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Let's go to the video screen.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Intro

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Friends, this time I have made a folder named video10

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: and I will not waste your time by opening open with code by right-clicking.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: In fact, I will make it in index.html.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And the topic of today's video is video.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: How to play a video, how to put a video in an HTML file,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: how to put audio, how to put media.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So adding a video is very straightforward.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: I will copy it here, which is our video tag.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It has an src attribute and it has some more attributes

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: which I will discuss with you.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: But first of all, I want to tell you here that video src is equal to

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: you will write here, so if you have video.mp4, it will play.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So let's see here, I have put it here with control

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: and I will click here and preview it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And you can see here that this video has come.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now it is a very big video, so what can I do?

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: I can give its width.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I can say here width is equal to 555 pixels.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And as soon as I do 555 pixels, in fact, I do not need to write px.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: I will only do 555, like in the image, we do not need to write px.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Here too we will not need to write px.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So as soon as I did width is equal to 555,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: in fact, I do one thing, I do height is equal to 555

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: so that it becomes smaller.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: In fact, I make it smaller, I do 255.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And you see it came here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now I play it because I have put control, I can play it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So the thing is that you can play the video like this.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now there are some attributes of the video tag here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It is very simple to use the video tag.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You should have a video.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You have given the path of the video.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: After that you have given the controls, so these controls will come to you.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You can download it, you can do full screen, you can do mute,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: you can do picture in picture.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: All this is automatically provided by your browser.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: But let me tell you about some attributes.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The first attribute is src, so you know that put the video here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The name of the video file is src.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: This video file can also come from the external URL.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You understand that if I have uploaded a video on Amazon S3 or somewhere else,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: then I can also put the URL there.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It is not necessary that the file is in your computer.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It can be on your server, it can also come from third party.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now what does the controls do?

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Adds video controls like play, pause and volume.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Which we saw here in the video of Bhupendra Jogi.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: That you are getting to see the controls here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now what is this thing?

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The browser automatically sees what the control add will be in your video,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: what will not be.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Then see what will autoplay do?

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It will automatically play as soon as the page is loaded.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So if I put autoplay here,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So you can see that it is autoplay here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I will remove autoplay from here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And our next attribute is loop.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: That is, once our video is played, it will keep looping.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Like I show you.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So it started again.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Once I finished it, it started again.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So this loop works like this.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The next attribute is muted.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Muted mutes the video.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So if I write here muted, sometimes we want the video to be muted.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: In fact, when I add videos here on codewithhari.com,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: and I demonstrate something like downloading VS Code or something,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: then I use the muted attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Because I don't want that when I record a video,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: if there is any background noise, you can hear it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: For example, I want to show you that this is the element.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I will make a video by scrolling like this,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: I will highlight it like this.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I don't need audio in it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I mute it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So you can use the muted attribute on your website.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Then the poster.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The poster is very important.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I have an image here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Download.jpg.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: If I write here, poster is equal to,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: and I write download.jpg,

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: then you will see something like this.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: This is how the poster looks.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Then I will play it, then the video will play.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So in a way, the thumbnail.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You saw the thumbnail of the YouTube video, right?

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: This is exactly the same, this poster attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So you can use all these attributes.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You know that width and height specify the dimension of the video.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Like I added both width and height here.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: You saw.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So I hope you understood this thing.

chunks.text: Now the thing I want to tell you after this is audio.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Now preload.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The most confusing attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: That the preload attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It can have these values.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: The first value can be none.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: This is the default value.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It indicates that the browser should not preload the audio at all.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Preload means.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: If you want the browser to fetch the data.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Then you will use the preload attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Otherwise you will not use the preload attribute.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Preload is equal to none.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Default value.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Preload is equal to metadata.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: This means that the browser will only preload the metadata.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: It will preload it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And by doing this, the browser will preload the entire audio.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So preload is equal to auto.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: If I do this, it will download.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: And will automatically load.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So that whenever the user plays it.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Then the audio is saved.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: video-audio-media-in-html
chunks.text: So this is the work of the preload attribute.
